author: USA TODAY, David Oliver, USA TODAY
title: Airbnb guests confused by company policies amid coronavirus: Here's how to get a refund
description: Airbnb has been updating its policies amid the escalating coronavirus pandemic. Customers claim what the company says it's doing to help isn't happening fast enough.
content:
The cruise industry has taken a major beating due to COVID-19, but analysts say bookings for 2021 cruises have increased since this time last year.
Buzz60
Like the majority of travel companies worldwide, Airbnb has been updating its policies throughout the … [+6885 chars]
